column1: #Text=When I first got elected to the legislature , my pastor 's wife was the executive assistant to the commissioner of the ISHAA , Blake Ress , and she knew how I felt about class basketball .
#Text=I did n't like it and I wished we 'd go back to single class [ basketball in Indiana ] .
#Text=But out of unity to my church and not wanting to cause my pastor 's wife consternation , I decided I would not do anything or pursue anything .
#Text=Then she left the IHSAA and then I had an opportunity to interject this multi-facet education proposal .
#Text=And then I met Bobby Cox , the then commissioner of the IHSAA , and I told him , " I 'll table this proposal , but let 's see what the public has to say . "
#Text=And he said , " that is a great idea .
